website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive yet quality padded bag designed to carry Polaris telescopes but also works with other brands.
pros: Durable shoulder strap and carry handles
Holds the tube in an internal, padded sleeve
Room for the tripod and mount too
Outside pocket for eyepieces and accessories
Also comes with a much-liked drawstring accessory pouch
Perfect for carrying Polaris and Meade Instruments telescopes but also fits other brands such as Explore Scientific, Gskyer, and Celestron (depending on model)
cons: Padding is limited and may not fully protect the telescope
Counterweight on end of bag makes it difficult to balance

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy bag, just not deep enough for fat optical tubes.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is sturdily made for a smaller scope. It is slightly too small for the 127-130mm tube diameter (while it holds the whole scope and its accessories, I found it very hard to fully zip up the bag). Still it is a fraction of the cost of an Orion bag and it is still a great deal nevertheless. It comes with velcro straps to secure your tripod, as well as an accessory bag that can hold the eyepieces etc. I would not recommend putting the counterweight in this bag together with the other compoennts for the fear it might move around and damage the other parts.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Wong

customer_reviews.title: Arrived used/unpacked
customer_reviews.text: The product is functional and fits my Celestron AstroMaster 70AZ, but it arrived unpackaged and used. You could easily make out the previous customer’s fingernail markings in the tears of the plastic the case was supposed to be inside. Unfortunately, this is becoming less and less of an uncommon occurrence on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Explore Scientific AR-127 refractor
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Explore Scientific AR-127 with diagonal. Zipper would not close with a 2" eyepiece, but not a big deal. It has some limited padding, will work well for transporting my ota. WIll not, of course, protect the case against dropping or anything more that minor impacts. However, I wasn't looking for that. Cases that would afford that protection would be much more expensive and much heavier. Exactly what I was looking for, for under $30.
customer_reviews.author: mandopickr

customer_reviews.title: Makes carrying my telescope and accessories easy
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this for a Celestron 127mm scope and its GoTo mount. All of my accessories fit in alongside it and the straps keep it from moving around and getting damage. I'm able to fit my power tank, my scope, my mount, my lenses, and some other accessories like lens cleaners. So far no damage, no issues with zippers or seams or anything else. It's a great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Great value and rugged
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for in home storage of 120mm and 150mm scopes. Bags are more rugged than I expected and have adequate padding for moving around and transporting in a vehicle without getting banged up.Not heavy duty enough for shipping though. Outside material is a fairly tough denier type material. Plenty of room inside for misc scope accessories. Very happy with this product and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Telescope Bag by Meade - Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Nice heavy quality with sewn in interior telescope tube sleeve. I have an Orion 9024 90mm Refractor Telescope. Bag fits tube and detached tripod. No real safe room for the EQ mount. That I put in a separate shoulder bag with my lenses and lens pan. Overall very good. 15 minutes to fully assemble telescope, mount and tripod after all apart. Buy it you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Warkenthien

customer_reviews.title: Inside isn't very well appointed and I am not sure if mine is defective or what but the velcro straps for securing your scope and the mount are very poorly placed and are of very poor lengths. Would be much easier if they just ...
customer_reviews.text: Kind of disappointing to be honest but there don't seem to be many other choices for my scope. Inside isn't very well appointed and I am not sure if mine is defective or what but the velcro straps for securing your scope and the mount are very poorly placed and are of very poor lengths. Would be much easier if they just hand't cheaped out on the velcro and made all 4 straps nice and long. Only one interior pocket too. That being said, it does get the job done and has allowed me to take my Polaris 130 all over the place for viewings.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive for what it is, but it serves well
customer_reviews.text: I have Meade Instruments Polaris 114 EQ telescope, and I needed a bag to store it when not in use. I found this carry bag, which was designed to fit the telescope and Yes, it does pretty well. It is a bit pricy (in my opinion) considering the build materials and what not, but it has a nice Meade branding on it with the blue color, and the bag is pretty large to fit everything in it (including all the lens of course), so I have no complaint at all.
customer_reviews.author: Hyongju P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Case
customer_reviews.text: Very nice telescope case. the only negative is that the velcro straps for the telescope tube are too far apart for the Mead 130EQ tube. Mead lists the case for the 130EQ but the pair of velcro straps are about 1-2 inches too far apart to fit over both ends of the tube straight. You have to pull the straps at one end back behind the lens barrel red-dot finder mount to engage the tube and hold both ends in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Ldh37

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I put a meade 114 eq- ar and it fits nicely, not room for much more other than the tripod and the parts of the telescope , it would be more than perfect with a pocket or two in the outside for the eyepieces , the pointer, filters ...
customer_reviews.author: Diego F.

customer_reviews.title: Total Eclipse Saver!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it as a back-up scope, worked great. Rigged up an *indirect* funnel projection viewer; the screen was dark grey daylight rear projection material, and it was the hit of the total eclipse crowd. Easy to set up, easy to transport, compact in its case. A great starter scope. Do not gaze at the Sun, ever. Ever. Or, as they say in astronomy clubs, do not stare at the Sun with your remaining eye!
customer_reviews.author: BrushUserz

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag!
customer_reviews.text: What a nice bag! Our Infinity 90mm fits perfect including the tripod and all our accessories. Exactly what I was looking for and a good value for the price. The separate pocket inside protects the telescope from the other items.
customer_reviews.author: Toñto Martin

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Designed for carrying a telescope and accessories. I like how I can now transport my instrument safely and protect it from dust or parts scattered about when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Bellamy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 70EQ
customer_reviews.text: Holds the tube in an internal sleeve. Room for the tripod and mount too. There is an outside pocket for eyepieces and accessories. I am using this for a Celestron 70EQ with tripod and eqaitorial mount.
customer_reviews.author: Great Ogre

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap bag
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for keeping your scope away from dust. No padding, so be advised and try to not be rough once your telescope is inside. Perfecto size for My Celestron Astromaster 70az.
customer_reviews.author: Didhier

customer_reviews.title: The factory recommended it but it doesn't hold the scope properly
customer_reviews.text: The internal straps are not positioned to hold the optical tube properly. The factory recommended it but it doesn't hold the scope properly. Been reading other reviews and it appears that Meade is to lazy or cheap to correct this! Had to jury rig my own fix - what a pain...
customer_reviews.author: Chilibob

customer_reviews.title: Great case.
customer_reviews.text: Someone asked for this as a gift, but they received 2, so I returned mine. It seems well made and was just what the person wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great Telescope Carry Bag
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this Telescope Carry Bag to secure my new telescope. All the items fit very well.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Rubianes

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality/price for the Meade 90
customer_reviews.text: Very tight fit, difficult to close zipper with the Meade 90 inside.
customer_reviews.author: Sales & Marketing Executive

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: Much easier then carrying around in a box. Seems to be built pretty well. Have to still be careful with it, not much foam or insulation to absorb any impacts. Be gentle lol
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H.

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty good bag
customer_reviews.text: I have a long tube (F/L 900mm) 4.5inch/114mm Newtonian Reflector. This bag holds the scope and my aluminum tripod and a few sundry things. I cannot fit my equatorial mount inside of it and that's okay. It is thinly padded inside and it has velcro straps to hold the tube in place. There is also a zippered side pocket inside the bag. This is a pretty good bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: For my scope that is 127mm. IT has the electronic stand and everything fits just fine in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: KLH

customer_reviews.title: Good design for my 6SE Equipment!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my 6SE tripod and Starsense etc. , I still use the original box with Styrofoam for tube....
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J.

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised by the size. But it was big enough to leave telescope attached to the tripod and put it all in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: shell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my Polaris 130. I keep my counterweight separate, though. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Nojokes

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice bages it fit almost everything I have But it need some more foamy to protect the scope and the accessory especially the camera
customer_reviews.author: saeed omar bahabri

customer_reviews.title: Messenger Bag MEADE Polaris 130
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Perfect for Polaris 130. Lots of space left. This is the best option for this telescope. There is a pocket for storing tools and eyepieces, a small case for documents. Velcro fasten optics securely. Unfortunately, it is not for sale in Russia. Thanks to Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: ander027

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but off balance
customer_reviews.text: Fits everything for my scope. The counter weight pocket at the far end throws off the balance when you are trying to carry however.
customer_reviews.author: okee

customer_reviews.title: Good value telescope case, but not the best.
customer_reviews.text: Good case for the cost compare to other similar bags. Wish the inside fastening straps were closer to each other so both can be used for a shorter tube telescopes.
customer_reviews.author: Valmax

customer_reviews.title: Does it's work. Wish it was made a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Does it's work. Wish it was made a little stronger materials.
customer_reviews.author: RafLay

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my telescope perfectly and it holds all my accessories
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Moser

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to my telescope hobby
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for carrying around my Meade Instruments Infinity 80mm telescope and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Rowlett

customer_reviews.title: and the instruction book is very good, but the zipper to the counterweight compartment detached
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, and the instruction book is very good, but the zipper to the counterweight compartment detached, and I had to reattach it and sew a "stop" in to prevent it from happening again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P. Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Came right away - a couple of days! Good price
customer_reviews.author: xxxx

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Celestron Astromaster 90AZ telescope and tripod very well ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Celestron Astromaster 90AZ telescope and tripod very well. It feels very durable and is not to hard to carry around as long as you balance the telescope and tripod somewhat.
customer_reviews.author: asb106

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Nice, fits telescope perfect. Lot easier to transport telescope with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Donna White

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit if you take your time to figure out ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit if you take your time to figure out the direction each piece goes in. I would like more padding so it could be bounced around a little more. The price is great.
customer_reviews.author: George Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit. I like the added small bag inside ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit. I like the added small bag inside also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: works very well you can add extra blankets for protection in the bottom if needed
customer_reviews.author: Gmanfal

product_meta.title: Meade Instruments 616001 Polaris 70-80-90mm Telescope Carry Bag, Blue
product_meta.description: Style:Polaris - 70-80-90 mm| Pattern Name:Carry BagThe Meade Polaris 70-80-90mm carry bag is designed for Polaris 70, 80, and 90 telescopes. This padded carry Bag Holds your Complete telescope setup. Now you can have your Infinity mount, tripod, optical tube, and accessories all in one place, ready to travel wherever you need to go! This carry bag comes with a shoulder strap and a one hand carry strap, as well as an accessory pouch with a drawstring to hold all of your Meade Polaris accessories.
feature_bullets: Padded Carry Bag to hold your Polaris 70, 80, or 90 mount, tripod, optical tube, and accessories
Includes a shoulder strap and one hand carry strap
Features an accessory pouch with drawstring closure to hold all of your Meade infinity accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars158 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
